name: Spoons
description: '''Spoons''' is a Canadian [[New wave music|new wave]] band, formed in [[Burlington, Ontario]] in 1979. They released several Canadian chart hits between 1982 and 1989, and in 1983, they were nominated for Most Promising Group of the Year at the [[Juno Awards]]. Their most popular songs include "[[Romantic Traffic]]", "[[Nova Heart]]", "Old Emotions", and "Tell No Lies".
